articles.description: While cybersecurity researchers don't know how the hacker managed to obtain data of over 267 million Facebook accounts, they suspect it might be due to a leak in a third-party API or scrapping.
articles.content:
By: Tech Desk | New Delhi | 
Updated: April 25, 2020 6:45:35 pm
The best way users can protect their Facebook account is by changing their passwords and ensure that they have not reused the current password elsewhereCybersecurity researchers say 267 million… [+2009 chars]

articles.title: Don't trust the next mail you get from HR, it might be a scam - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Hackers have found an ingenious way of getting to you, through mails from HR. So better pay attention to all those mails from the HR department.
articles.content: We all get mails from the HR department at least once every day, and mostly we tend to ignore them. But scammers are trying to make the most out of it these days. As found by the research and security firm Cofence, scammers are trying to steal your office cre… [+1671 chars]
